seng301.assn4.product

Interface ProductFacadeListener


  • public interface ProductFacadeListener
    Permits objects to listen to one or more ProductFacades when registered with them.
    Author:
    Robert J. Walker

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void productsAdded(ProductFacade productFacade, org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.ProductKind kind, int count)
      Signals an event in which one or more products have been added from the facade.
      void productsRemoved(ProductFacade productFacade, org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.ProductKind kind, int count)
      Signals an event in which one or more products have been removed from the facade.

    • Method Detail

      • productsRemoved

        void productsRemoved(ProductFacade productFacade,
                     org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.ProductKind kind,
                     int count)
        Signals an event in which one or more products have been removed from the facade.
        Parameters:
        productFacade - The facade in which the event occurred.
        kind - The kind of the product involved.
        count - The count of products involved.

      • productsAdded

        void productsAdded(ProductFacade productFacade,
                   org.lsmr.vending.frontend4.ProductKind kind,
                   int count)
        Signals an event in which one or more products have been added from the facade.
        Parameters:
        productFacade - The facade in which the event occurred.
        kind - The kind of the product involved.
        count - The count of products involved.
